item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1476; 09:24PM; 122 S Coronado St; MAP: https://bit.ly/35fErHm; Westlake; KNOCKDOWN: 31 firefighters extinguished the fire in 18 minutes with no injuries reported. The cause and $ loss are TBD. No further details.; FS 20; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 E11 E20 E211 E220 E3 RA11 RA20 T11 T20; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1476; 09:06PM; 122 S Coronado St; MAP: https://bit.ly/35fErHm; Westlake; Two story, vacant balloon-style construction single family dwelling well involved in fire with an exposed building on one side. Firefighters are deploying the wagon battery to quickly get a large stream of water on the fire while also investigating the exposed building for extension.; FS 20; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 E11 E20 E211 E220 E3 RA11 RA20 T11 T20; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1222; 06:20PM; 19123 W Friar St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ILcfdl; Tarzana; KNOCKDOWN: 31 firefighters extinguished the fire in 19 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was contained to the converted garage. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 93; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E273 E293 E305 E72 E73 RA72 RA84 T105 T73 T93; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1222; 06:01PM; 19123 W Friar St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ILcfdl; Tarzana; A converted garage to the rear of a single family dwelling with has heavy fire showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 93; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E273 E293 E305 E72 E73 RA72 RA84 T105 T73 T93; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire - With Injuries; INC#1130; 04:54PM; 17642 W Miranda St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3INGfoG; Encino; Firefighters quickly extinguished a fire to a house behind a single family dwelling. One patient is being transported with, as initially assessed, significant burn injuries (age/gender unknown). LAFD Arson is responding per protocol for injury. The initial 9-1-1 call was received at 4:45PM. ; FS 83; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 5; AR1 BC10 E100 E273 E293 E83 RA100 RA93 T73 T93; CH9; 18; Margaret Stewart

Auto vs Bike; INC#1109; 04:33PM; 13336 W Bombay St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Ljz3Cn; Sylmar; Reported auto versus bicycle with two pediatric patients (age / gender unknown) both being transported in *at least* serious condition. All media queries regarding the collision are referred to LAPD Inc# 2786. No further details.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E298 E91 EM15 RA91 RA98 T98; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1384; 08:42PM; 6926 S Bonsallo Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3qDTsKO; Vermont-Slauson; KNOCKDOWN: 31 firefighters extinguished the fire in 16 minutes with no injuries reported. The building type is updated to a one story, multi-family dwelling. The fire was contained to one unit and the primary/secondary searches found no occupants. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E233 E266 E33 E57 E66 RA257 RA833 T33 T66; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1384; 08:26PM; 6926 S Bonsallo Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3qDTsKO; Vermont-Slauson; One story, single family dwelling with fire showing on the Bravo side.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E233 E266 E33 E57 E66 RA257 RA833 T33 T66; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Physical Rescue ; INC#1376; 08:20PM; 14800 W San Fernando Mission Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wGGTlJ; Mission Hills; One vehicle into the wash with two patients. One patient requires extrication and a litter basket operation is being deployed to bring the patients up to the surface for transportation. Both patients (age/gender unknown at this time) are considered in *at least* serious condition due to the mechanism of injury. LAPD Inc# 3885; FS 75; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E275 E298 E7 E75 EM15 HR3 RA75 RA98 T75 T98 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Traffic - Vehicle into Wash; INC#1295; 07:33PM; 21400 W Bassett St; MAP: https://bit.ly/36xNbJB; Canoga Park; Firefighters responded to a vehicle in the wash (reportedly went over the bridge) with one patient already out of the vehicle. One patient transported (age/gender/condition unknown). The initial 9-1-1 call was received at 7:09PM. Any media questions are referred to LAPD Inc# 3583. No further details.; FS 72; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; E105 E305 RA72 T105; CH8; Margaret Stewart
